data.title: GAZA LIVE BLOG: Arrest Warrants Soon | ‘Aid Delivery Impossible’ | Haniyeh’s Sister Killed – Day 263
data.meta_description: Ten members of Ismail Haniyeh's family, including his sister, were killed in an Israeli raid on their family home in the Beach Refugee Camp.
data.text:
By Palestine Chronicle Staff

Ten members of Ismail Haniyeh’s family, including his sister, were killed in an Israeli raid on their family home in the Beach Refugee Camp.

According to the Israeli newspaper Haaretz, dozens of Israeli reserve soldiers announced that they would not return to military service in Gaza even if they were to be punished.

The Israeli army targeted western Rafah, south of the Gaza Strip, with air strikes, artillery shelling, and tank fire.

According to Gaza’s Ministry of Health, 37,626 Palestinians have been killed, and 86,098 wounded in Israel’s ongoing genocide in Gaza starting on October 7.

This blog has been discontinued. Click here for the new blog.

Click here for the previous blogs.

LATEST UPDATES

Wednesday, June 26, 12:30 am (GMT+2)

US MISSION TO UN: We will continue to work with Egypt, Qatar, and Israel to achieve a ceasefire in Gaza.

CHANNEL 12: Tel Aviv expects the International Criminal Court to issue arrest warrants against Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Defense Minister Yoav Galant soon.

ISRAELI MEDIA: A fire broke out a short while ago near the Israeli Ofrit military base in the Har Hatzovim area in occupied Jerusalem.

WFP: Gaza’s hostile operating environment makes aid delivery impossible.

Tuesday, June 25, 11:00 pm (GMT+2)

AXIOS: The Biden administration will hold a meeting with Israel that was canceled due to Netanyahu’s statement about the arms shipment.

YAHYA SAREE: We carried out a qualitative operation with a new ballistic missile that targeted an Israeli ship in the Arabian Sea.

INTERNATIONAL RED CROSS: The food crisis in Gaza has reached a critical point.

FINANCIAL TIMES: Israel and Hezbollah told Washington that they do not want an all-out war.

PENTAGON: The Minister of Defense stressed that diplomacy is the only way to avoid escalation in the Middle East.

Tuesday, June 25, 10:00 pm (GMT+2)

AL-JAZEERA: Al-Jazeera obtained leaked clips from a camera installed on a police dog showing the occupation attacking an elderly Palestinian woman in her home in Jabaliya, in the northern Gaza Strip.

GUTERRES: We stressed to Israel the need to commit to protecting humanitarian facilities.

Tuesday, June 25, 9:00 pm (GMT+2)

US STATE DEPARTMENT: We are conducting our own reviews regarding possible war crimes in Gaza.

Tuesday, June 25, 7:30 pm (GMT+2)

GAZA CIVIL DEFENSE: The occupation deliberately targeted 5 headquarters for displaced persons.

HANIYEH: The blood of the martyrs demands that we not compromise or make concessions.

AL-JAZEERA: Pro-Palestine activists demonstrated in front of the residence of Israeli Defense Minister Yoav Galant during his visit to Washington and chanted, “You cannot hide. You are committing genocide.”

Supreme Court Mandate – Ultra-Orthodox Jews Must Serve in the Army

ISRAEL HAYOM: Israel Hayom quoted the Israeli government’s legal advisor as saying, “The security system must move immediately to recruit religious school students.”

Tuesday, June 25, 7:00 pm (GMT+2)

WHO:

There is no safe place in the Gaza Strip.

We provide 80% of medical equipment in the Gaza Strip.

There is a need to transfer critically ill patients out of the Gaza Strip.

We are unable to transport critically ill patients due to the closure of the crossings.

GALLANT: It is time for Washington to fulfill its obligations regarding supplying us with weapons.

GANTZ: Hamas is an idea that cannot be destroyed, but we can eliminate its capabilities.

Tuesday, June 25, 6:00 pm (GMT+2)

CHANNEL 12: Benjamin Netanyahu’s government asked Israeli National Security Advisor Tzachi Hanegbi to clarify his statements regarding the inability to eliminate the Hamas movement.

NATIONAL AND ISLAMIC FORCES IN GAZA: We warn against plans to replace the Rafah crossing.

UN OFFICIAL: The majority of Gaza’s population suffers from food insecurity.

AVIGDOR LIEBERMAN: Everything Netanyahu does aims to extend his stay in power.

ISRAELI SOURCES: Israeli firefighting crews continue to try to put out fires in Dishon, northern Israel, after they were targeted by drones from Lebanon.

AL-QUDS BRIGADES: Our fighters detonated “a number of ground devices in Zionist military vehicles on the traffic and supply line in the Tal Zorob area, southwest of the city of Rafah, and we bombed them in conjunction with the enemy’s positions with a barrage of heavy and regular mortar shells.”

PALESTINIAN MEDIA: Israeli occupation forces blow up buildings in the vicinity of a roundabout west of the city of Rafah, south of the Gaza Strip.

EUROMED MONITOR: Israel deliberately bombs shelters for displaced people in the Gaza Strip and kills them under the flag of the United Nations.

GAZA HEALTH MINISTRY: All hospitals are completely destroyed and targeted.

AL-JAZEERA: Hezbollah announced that it carried out “an air attack with a squadron of assault marches on the headquarters of a brigade belonging to the 91st Division in the Nahal Gershom area, targeting the positions and settlements of enemy officers and soldiers, which led to a number of casualties among them and the outbreak of fire inside the headquarters.”‏

CHANNEL 14: 11 false alarms have been activated since the beginning of this month at the Kerem Shalom site in the Gaza envelope, and residents testify to a lack of confidence in the Israeli army as a result.

AVIGDOR LIEBERMAN: The Israeli army needs manpower after losing an entire brigade of soldiers who fell in battle or were seriously injured.

Tuesday, June 25, 4:30 pm (GMT+2)

ISRAELI MILITARY OFFICIAL: The head of the Israeli Air Force’s strategic unit said that after 8 months of war, we were only able to destroy 35% to 40% of Hamas’s strength.

CHANNEL 12: Chief of Staff Herzi Halevy decided to appoint a female officer close to him as head of the war oversight department, which angered senior army officers.

ISRAELI ARMY: 13 soldiers, were injured in the battles in the Gaza Strip during the past 24 hours, including 7 critically,

AL-JAZEERA: Sirens sounded in the Kerem Shalom area, south of the Gaza Strip.

Tuesday, June 25, 3:00 pm (GMT+2)

ISRAEL HAYOM: A fire broke out in the Dishon area and an explosion was heard in Ramot Naftali in the Upper Galilee.

WHITE HOUSE: Biden is committed to reaching a hostage deal under which humanitarian aid can continue.

PALESTINIAN MEDIA: Six Palestinians were killed and injured in an Israeli bombing that targeted a house in the center of Khan Yunis and a tent for displaced people in Mawasi Rafah.

‘Under Rubble, Detained, Buried’ – 20,000 Children Missing in Gaza

AL-JAZEERA: An Israeli raid targeted the vicinity of the town of Al-Adisa, south of Lebanon.

LAZZARINI: Israel bombed 190 UNRWA facilities in the Gaza Strip.

JOINT INVESTIGATION: A joint investigation by 13 international media outlets revealed that Israel systematically destroyed the media infrastructure in the Gaza Strip and that it targeted, with tanks, cameras providing live images from Gaza to several agencies.

GAZA HEALTH MINISTRY: 37,658 Palestinians have been killed, and 86,237 wounded in Israel’s ongoing genocide in Gaza starting on October 7.

LAPID: Israel is losing its position in the international community.

GAZA GOVERNMENT MEDIA OFFICE: Aid has not entered the Gaza Strip for about 50 days.

AL-JAZEERA: An Israeli artillery shelling targeted the town of Khiam in southern Lebanon.

Tuesday, June 25, 1:30 pm (GMT+2)

INTERNATIONAL REPORT: About 96% of Gaza’s population faces high levels of acute food insecurity.

YEDIOTH AHRONOTH: Families of Israeli detainees demand an immediate meeting with Netanyahu.

AL-QUDS BRIGADES: Along with the Al-Qassam Brigades, we bombed with mortar shells Israeli occupation soldiers and vehicles penetrating the Yabna camp, south of the city of Rafah.

AL-QUDS BRIGADES: We bombed with heavy-caliber mortar shells the enemy command headquarters in the Abu Oreiban site in the Netzarim axis.

AL-JAZEERA: The Israeli army burned homes in the Brazil neighborhood in Rafah, south of the Gaza Strip, and carried out artillery shelling in the city center.

HAMAS: The massacres carried out by the Israeli occupation, including the bombing of the Haniyeh family home in the Beach Camp, are confirmation of its intentional targeting of civilians.

Tuesday, June 25, 12:00 pm (GMT+2)

AMOS HOCHSTEIN: Hezbollah needs to negotiate indirectly with Israel instead of escalating tensions.

LIEBERMAN: The Supreme Court’s decision to conscript Haredim is an important step.

AL-JAZEERA: 41 people were killed in Israeli raids on Gaza City since dawn today.

ISRAELI MEDIA: The Israeli Supreme Court rejected the law exempting religious people from military service, contrary to the government’s decision.

Tuesday, June 25, 11:00 am (GMT+2)

AL-QASSAM BRIGADES: In conjunction with the Al-Quds Brigades, we targeted occupation soldiers and vehicles in the Yabna camp in Rafah, south of the Gaza Strip, with mortar shells.

RUSSIAN MEDIA: Abbas will visit Moscow soon.

Tuesday, June 25, 10:00 am (GMT+2)

HAARETZ: Dozens of Israeli reserve soldiers announced that they would not return to military service in Gaza even if they were to be punished.

Tuesday, June 25, 09:00 am (GMT+2)

ISRAEL HAYOM: Residents of the north will not return before the end of August

PALESTINIAN MEDIA: Three Palestinians were killed and a number were wounded in an Israeli raid that targeted Palestinians on Al Wahda Street, west of Gaza City.

AL-JAZEERA: Ten members of Ismail Haniyeh’s family, including his sister, were killed in an Israeli raid on their family home in the Beach Refugee Camp.

Shati Massacre – Ten Members of Haniyeh’s Family Killed, Including Sister

Tuesday, June 25, 08:00 am (GMT+2)

AFP: An Israeli tank hit our office in Gaza.

Tuesday, June 25, 06:00 am (GMT+2)

POLITICO (citing US officials): Washington will help Israel if Hezbollah carries out retaliatory strikes.

Tuesday, June 25, 05:00 am (GMT+2)

PALESTINIAN MEDIA: The Israeli army targeted western Rafah, south of the Gaza Strip, with air strikes, artillery shelling, and tank fire.

Tuesday, June 25, 04:00 am (GMT+2)

AL-JAZEERA: 15 Palestinians were martyred in 3 raids launched by the Israeli occupation forces tonight on different areas in Gaza City.

PALESTINIAN MEDIA: Several Palestinians were killed and wounded in an Israeli bombing of two shelter schools belonging to the United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees (UNRWA) in the Beach Camp and Al-Daraj neighborhood in Gaza City.

Tuesday, June 25, 01:00 am (GMT+2)

US STATE DEPARTMENT: Blinken reaffirmed Washington’s strict commitment to Israel’s security.

CHANNEL 12: Families of prisoners killed in Gaza refused to meet Netanyahu.

YEDIOTH AHRONOTH: Sharp messages were exchanged in recent hours between the Biden administration and Netanyahu’s office. The American side demanded that Netanyahu declare his commitment loudly and say that he fully supports the plan.

ISLAMIC RESISTANCE IN IRAQ: We attacked a military target in Haifa with drones.

Monday, June 24, 11:30 pm (GMT+2)

US DEPARTMENT OF STATE: Austin will discuss with Gallant how to avoid a strategic defeat in Gaza.

(The Palestine Chronicle)
